rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0001
rows.name: Would those cowards sit still for a minute?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0002
rows.name: I'll fry the whole damn planet if I have to![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0003
rows.name: Ryyz, have you forgotten human city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0005
rows.name: Stop with all the thinking—it's not your strong suit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0006
rows.name:
But you cannot win like this.
You must transform Zu Pharg, now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0007
rows.name:
I was just about to, okay?!
Now would you kindly please SHUT UP?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0008
rows.name: No one makes a fool of me...NO ONE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0010
rows.name: How could something that big transform in-flight?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0011
rows.name:
The Ganglion must have some kind of
antigravitational flight technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0013
rows.name: That's the only thing that makes sense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0014
rows.name: Our flight modules still rely on propulsion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0015
rows.name:
I hate to admit it, but this is way beyond
anything we've got. We're outclassed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Humanity's made great advances before—
especially when they were needed the most.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0019
rows.name: C'mon, don't we all just want to coexist peacefully?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0020
rows.name:
But now that you've seen our little secret,
I've no choice but to WIPE YOU OUT![ST:wait ]
